Introduction¶

This documentation provides a comprehensive API reference for the Parkinson Dashboard backend. The backend is built with Python 3.12 (or lower) and FastAPI, handling video processing using YOLOv8 and camera inputs.

Note

Ensure you have installed all dependencies from requirements/desktop.txt or requirements/jetson.txt before building docs.
